name: Peoplebox
headline: OKR, Performance and Engagement tool integrated with your worktools
description:
Peoplebox is a one-stop okr, performance management and employee engagement platform that deeply integrates with your current work tools. 

It aligns OKRs, 1:1s, Performance Reviews and Compensation into a single platform to drive better execution, visibility, and team performance.

Peoplebox integrates with all work tools (Slack, MS Teams, Workday, SQL, Jira, Asana, Hubspot, etc) to drive greater adoption of all business and HR processes and build an engaged and high performing culture with 90% less admin.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:productivity; industry:hr-tech; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

## FAQs
Have more questions? Contact our support team to get what you need. **support@peoplebox.ai**
Who is Peoplebox.ai built for? 
  * **CHROs** focused on aligning talent strategies with impactful business outcomes. 
  * **TA leaders** leveraging GenAI to hire smarter, faster, and better. 
  * **Talent leaders** looking for a customized, deeply integrated tool that employees genuinely love to use. 
  * **Business heads** aiming to execute faster and build a high performing culture. 


How secure is my data with Peoplebox.ai? 
We take your data security seriously. [Peoplebox.ai](https://www.peoplebox.ai/<https:/www.peoplebox.ai/>) is fully GDPR-compliant and follows SOC-2 standards, ensuring that your data is protected with the highest security measures. You can trust that your information is handled responsibly, keeping it safe and secure at all times.
Does Peoplebox.ai integrate with my existing work tools? 
Absolutely. We offer a wide range of integrations with popular HRIS, communication, data, and SSO tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Sheets, Jira, BigQuery, MySQL, PostgreSQL, HubSpot, Looker, Salesforce, Darwinbox, BambooHR, Keka, Freshteam, Zoho People, Paylocity, SAP SuccessFactors, and Qandle. 
Our team can work with you to ensure smooth integration with your current tech stack.
Can I try before I buy? 
Of course! You can [take a product tour](https://www.peoplebox.ai/<https:/www.peoplebox.ai/peoplebox-product-tours/>) or [request a demo](https://www.peoplebox.ai/<https:/www.peoplebox.ai/request-a-demo/>) so you can experience the benefits of Peoplebox.ai firsthand. It‚Äôs a great way to see how our platform can work for your organization before making a commitment.

## FAQs
Have more questions? Contact our support team to get what you need. **support@peoplebox.ai**
Who is Peoplebox.ai built for? 
  * **CHROs** focused on aligning talent strategies with impactful business outcomes. 
  * **TA leaders** leveraging GenAI to hire smarter, faster, and better. 
  * **Talent leaders** looking for a customized, deeply integrated tool that employees genuinely love to use. 
  * **Business heads** aiming to execute faster and build a high performing culture. 


How secure is my data with Peoplebox.ai? 
We take your data security seriously. Peoplebox.ai‚ü®86‚ü© is fully GDPR-compliant and follows SOC-2 standards, ensuring that your data is protected with the highest security measures. You can trust that your information is handled responsibly, keeping it safe and secure at all times.
Does Peoplebox.ai integrate with my existing work tools? 
Absolutely. We offer a wide range of integrations with popular HRIS, communication, data, and SSO tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Sheets, Jira, BigQuery, MySQL, PostgreSQL, HubSpot, Looker, Salesforce, Darwinbox, BambooHR, Keka, Freshteam, Zoho People, Paylocity, SAP SuccessFactors, and Qandle. 
Our team can work with you to ensure smooth integration with your current tech stack.
Can I try before I buy? 
Of course! You can take a product tour‚ü®87‚ü© or request a demo‚ü®30‚ü© so you can experience the benefits of Peoplebox.ai firsthand. It‚Äôs a great way to see how our platform can work for your organization before making a commitment.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Peoplebox**

Founded in 2018 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, Peoplebox is nestled in San Francisco and has grown to a team of 35 dedicated employees. The company has positioned itself as a comprehensive OKR (Objectives and Key Results), performance management, and employee engagement platform that integrates seamlessly with popular work tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Workday, and Jira. 

**Mission and Vision**

Peoplebox's mission is clear: to streamline the processes surrounding OKRs, performance reviews, 1:1s, and employee engagement into a single, intuitive platform. The goal is to enhance execution, increase visibility, and ultimately drive better team performance‚Äîall while reducing administrative burdens by an astounding 90%.

**Key Features**

1. **Performance Management**: Peoplebox allows organizations to run performance reviews, 360-degree feedbacks, and weekly check-ins without the typical hassle. They even offer functionalities that integrate with Slack for real-time performance reviews.
   
2. **Goal Alignment**: Their OKR management tools help teams align their individual goals with broader company objectives, enhancing focus and clarity.

3. **Employee Engagement**: Peoplebox includes automated engagement surveys, insights, and anonymous messaging to gather feedback and maintain high levels of morale.

4. **AI Innovations**: The introduction of AI features is a game-changer, like the AI-driven resume screening tool designed to accelerate the hiring process and improve talent acquisition.

**Integrations and Compatibility**

One of Peoplebox's standout advantages is its ability to integrate with a wide variety of existing tools, ensuring smooth adoption within different environments. The platform connects effortlessly with systems across HR, sales, and project management spaces.

**Recognition and Client Base**

With a 4.7 rating on G2 and Capterra, Peoplebox has successfully earned the trust of over 600 organizations, including industry leaders like Disney and Razorpay. This speaks volumes about its usability and effectiveness in modern workplaces.

**Leadership and Growth**

Led by the visionary guidance of their Group Partner, Michael Seibel, Peoplebox demonstrates a forward-thinking approach to workforce management. The company is poised for growth, driving better employee experiences and enhanced business outcomes through its innovative solutions.

**Why Choose Peoplebox?**

In a world where employee engagement and performance insights are paramount, Peoplebox is designed to empower HR leaders with the tools they need to impact business growth positively. By focusing on integration, usability, and innovative technologies, Peoplebox not only simplifies processes but elevates overall company culture.

**Explore More**

Curious to see how Peoplebox can transform your organization? Check out their website [here](https://www.peoplebox.ai) for demos and additional information on how they can drive your performance and engagement forward.
